references.reason: This paper introduces the Shapley value, a fundamental concept in game theory that is closely related to the Möbius transform and is used for explaining model predictions.

references.paper_title: A unified approach to interpreting model predictions
references.reason: This paper provides a unified approach to interpreting model predictions, which is a key challenge addressed by the Möbius transform in this paper.
This paper discusses equivalent representations of set functions, which are fundamental to understanding the Möbius transform and its properties.

references.paper_title: BERT: Pre-training of deep bidirectional transformers for language understanding
references.reason: This paper introduces BERT, a language model used in the experiments of this paper to demonstrate the effectiveness of the Möbius transform in explaining model predictions.

references.paper_title: Simple and practical algorithm for sparse Fourier transform
references.reason: This paper introduces a simple and practical algorithm for sparse Fourier transform, which is relevant to the efficient computation of the Möbius transform.
